name: A Royal Proposition
nutshell: Penny-Rose, a stone mason in the Principality of Castaliae is summoned by the Queen. She asks Penny-Rose to marry the prince... but only for one year. To succeed the throne, the prince needs to marry a woman of "unimpeachable virtue." Startled by such a sudden request, Penny-Rose hesitantly accepts. Despite knowing he is to marry another after her, she is slowly drawn to the prince, and eventually falls in love...

name: Ojou to Shinonome
nutshell: The lady has fallen in love with her cool and smart servant, Shinonome! Too bad Shinonome is actually very clueless, and completely unaware about the poor lady's feelings… What will happen to the little lady who's trying her best?

name: Fate/hollow ataraxia - Tamate Note (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Collection of stories. Underlying theme is:
"When you're a bishoujo dating sim protagonist, might as well take the good with the bad, right?"

name: Aruji no Oose no Mama ni
nutshell:
Collection of oneshots, the majority of which are extra of the author's other works.


Your Word Is my Command (Aruji no Oose no Mama ni)
Nanjou Hiroaki always finds himself unconsciously taking care of others. But soon, he becomes conflicted and guilty when he realizes that he has grown to rely on his underclassman Asouzu…


Seppun Kindan Shoujouchuu
Student council tagalong Takafu is used to being close to his friend the president, but it's underclassman Niyuu who keeps kissing him! Can the super dense Takafu figure out why he's suddenly so irresistible to the younger man?


Fujino-kun's Revolt [Electric Hands extra]


Ootsuka Family's Weekend [sequel to Brothers Battle, third story of Electric Hands]


Higan Tassei hi [Damarashite Katarazu Hitomi de Otose extra]


Jinsei Kouro [Renai Yuugi extra]


Zipped Open [Koi wa Ina Mono Myouna Mono extra]


Koi wa Ina Mono Myouna Mono [extra of the release of the same name]


F no Higeki (Tragedy of F)


I Got Some Business [Aruji no Oose no Mama ni extra]


I'm Not Letting You Go [Seppun Kindan Shoujouchuu extra]


Birthday Present [Koi wa Ina Mono Myouna Mono extra]

name: Extra Existence
nutshell:
Thirteen years ago, an unknown object appeared at Shinjuku. That creature regularly gives birth to a demon. Therefore, our world is being eaten clean.
The military found a weapon capable of fighting these creatures, a special power known as "exex" that becomes part of the human body.

name: Shounen Butterfly
nutshell:
A collection of oneshots.


Shounen Butterfly
He is nice, yet he is mean. An underclassman, who is quite highhanded. What are Nakazawa-kun's true intentions under his mixed reactions towards Okano.


Ikemen Kanojo
She looks so much like a guy, a bishounen but still!! Once, she wore a hairpin, but the guys made fun of her, saying it didn't suit her. She is still 100% girl, and what happens when she wants to joins an accessory making class, meeting the owner of a quiet accessory store?


Nostalgic Complex


Ao no Hitoiro
At first, Sakurai thinks Aoi-kun is kinda scary, but when he speaks up against a group of girls that are making fun of Sakurai's inexperience, she slowly grows more fond of him.


Akai Koi no Territory
I love cats! But cats seem to hate me… At that time I met a cat-tamer, Kai-kun?!

name: Doreiku - GANG AGE -
nutshell:
Greater Tokyo Ward: people are obsessed with a device named "SCM" that can mentally enslave others.
In this world you can "borrow" and become a "slave" or "lend" and become a "master".
This work is the latest in the mystery-group image drama "Slave Ward" series by Shinichi Okada,
with a cumulative circulation of over 3.6 million.

name: Kuroko no Basuke - Lip Service (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Aomine x Kise

name: Touhou - Kore ga Watashi no Librarian!! (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
A story about how Patchy acquired the services of a cute, energetic and loyal (if not all that bright) librarian just after she arrived at the SDM.
Part of Touhou series.

name: Infectee
nutshell: The man-eating monster 'Infectee.' I became a monster.

name: Drive
nutshell: Nagisa Yamagami is a high school girl in her rebellious phase. Constantly in trouble at school, she has even abandoned her one redeeming quality - ballet - in opposition to her mother’s wishes. However, on the way home one day, a chance encounter with a blind teenage boy in the middle of town changes her fate drastically. Another groundbreaking work by the master of youthful drama, Yamada Hamachi!

name: Unmei no Onnanoko
nutshell:
The short stories of Tomoko Yamashita.
First girl: There was a girl in the middle of the gruesome incidents. ‘I thought that I was invincible.’
Second girl: A recollection of ‘a girl’ who didn’t love an excellent boy, ‘me’.
Third girl: The future where you are cursed when you are born. The only girl who wasn’t cursed is nervous about her undecided future. ‘She is pitiful for not being cursed!’

name: Yuri Otaku Family
nutshell:
A girl comes out to her family. However, her family are total yuri otakus. Hilarity ensures when she brings her girlfriend.
Originally created to celebrate the digital release of Cheerful Amnesia Volume 1.

name: Undercover Cops
nutshell:
Based on the beat 'em up of the same name.
In 2043, a city is assaulted by the Mad Scientist Dr. Crayborn and his large gang of thugs. To counter this, the mayor hires a group of three professional "city sweepers" to clean the streets.

name: Ley De Labios Y Lengua
nutshell: Para encontrar a la hermana misteriosamente desaparecida. La corredora han Zaiyu fue el famoso club nocturno. Pero encontró la industria oscura escondida en el club nocturno bajo el negocio normal, un "banquete de grupo de chicas" al servicio de la clase alta. Y me encontré con Liu yuan un hombre misterioso que se convirtió en ropa de mujer y era a la vez justo y malvado ¿podrán los dos descubrir los secretos que se esconden en la biblioteca? ¿quién controla todo esto detrás?

name: Mob Kousei no Ore Demo Boukensha ni Nareba Riajuu ni Naremasuka?
nutshell:
Dungeons, and along with them monsters and related disasters, started appearing in the modern world decades ago. With this brought many changes, the biggest one being adventurers and the monster cards they use to summon summons to fight and conquer dungeons with.
Kitagawa Utamaro, or just Maro, is a mob highschooler who becomes an adventurer due to being incited by a former friend of his having sudden social success among their peers simply by becoming an adventurer himself.
However, things aren't quite as easy for Maro. Just becoming an adventurer in name only isn't enough for him to gain his spotlight, giving him no recourse but to actually tackle dungeons with the peculiar and not very versatile monster cards that he barely manages to scrape up.

name: Grim Reaper
nutshell: Yuuka Shinchiro is a 2nd year highschool student whose parents passed away several years ago in an accident. When he's walking through a park at night, a child's head jumps into his hands and he's bitten by an alien. Soon after, he wakes up and dismisses what happened as just part of his dream. When he wakes up, the bite mark is appears just where it was in his "dream"! The next morning, the news reports that a child's head is found in a park along with lots of blood. As he goes to check out the scene, he finds a violent man asking him about the "abyss". The violent man later visits his house and calls him the Grim Reaper.

name: Boku wa Kimi no Shiro
nutshell: "When winter came, you swept away my sadness. When it passed, the memories of you lingered in my mind." A love that transcends time between a winter spirit and a girl broken with sorrow…

name: Odyssey
nutshell: Similar to Sanctuary, Odyssey is another story on thought-provoking political revolution. This time the theater is international, as a group of young government elites execute their secret plan to raise Japan as the economic and military superpower in the Far East. How will they carry out their objectives? Is it through a new military presence, or through Japan's economic know-how? How will the U.S. respond to Japan's new "independence," and will the political and economic figures in control of Japan now let these young elites re-shape their world?

name: Mutant Turtles - Ore-tachi ya Kame na Ninkumi
nutshell: Roughly translated as "We're The Ninja Turtles!" and a tie-in to the 2012 animated series. Ordinary schoolkid Urashimada Taro serves as the unwilling caretaker of the wacky and off-the-wall turtles, who are mistaken for foreign exchange students.

name: Koi no Otemae, Choudai Itashimasu.
nutshell: Nanako enters high school looking for an afterschool activity and a romantic interest. She thought she'd found both in Yukiya-senpai of the Tea Ceremony Club, but the cool and handsome Yukiya rejected her club application. Nanako wasn't about to give up, though, and Yukiya finally allowed her one week to prove herself worthy of the Tea Ceremony Club. A sweet love story for two over tea!

name: Monster Duke's Daughter
nutshell:
When her mom goes missing, three-year-old Lotilucia stumbles on a magic crest that transports her to the estate of House Frodium, one of the empire’s most powerful noble families. Little Lottie immediately recognizes Duke Damian Frodium as her dad; he is the so-called “Monster Duke” of demon descent. Once taken into the house, Lottie does her best to stay out of his way. But then she stumbles on a magic book that shows her a story about Duke Frodium’s adopted daughter replacing his dead daughter named Lotilucia! Lottie is shocked but also emboldened by the prophetic tale. If she is meant to die anyway, she might as well be her cheeky self and do as she pleases! This new Lottie wins over her demon dad along with his staff, but will she manage to stay alive and thrive as the Monster Duke’s daughter?

Original Webtoon: Naver Series, Naver Webtoon
Official Translations:

English: TappyToon, Webtoon
Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语
Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia
Japanese / 日本語
Thai / ภาษาไทย


Chapter 18 BGM by MZ

name: The Return of Godzilla
nutshell: Something monstrous rises up from the sea and nearly sinks a Japanese fishing boat. The sole survivor tells a tale that no one wants to believe. But when a Russian nuclear submarine is destroyed in the same waters, the world is forced to face the truth: Godzilla has returned! This manga classic was originally published by Dark Horse in black and white in 1988.

name: Yubisaki wa Koi no Aji
nutshell:
1-5) Fingertips' Love
Hajime and Eiji, who were childhood friends, have been reunited at an all-boy's high school (oh, the possibilities). Their friendship is still as strong, but it seems as Eiji is ready to confess. Will Hajime accept the confession? How many other boys in this school will be joining the boi love craze? And will anyone ever call Uncle Kai-Sensei?


Playing with Fire
Masao, who was dumped, decided to flee home to the countryside to get over his heartbreak.


Extras

name: Jojo's Bizarre Adventure - Kirakira Hoshi ga Naku Yoru ni (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Guido Mista x Giorno Giovanna doujin
Mista starts learning to play guitar, but Giorno’s not sure how he feels about it… (set after the events of Part 5, contains spoilers).
Artist's pixiv: https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/9791618
